<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/habits/{habitId}/completions"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Mark habit as completed

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"habitId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["date","completed","pomodoros"],"properties":{"date":{"type":"string","format":"date"},"completed":{"type":"boolean"},"pomodoros":{"type":"integer","minimum":0},"intensity":{"type":"integer","enum":[0,1,2,3,4],"example":2,"title":"IntensityLevel"},"note":{"type":"string"}},"title":"CompletionCreate"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Created","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["id","habitId","date","completed","pomodoros"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"habitId":{"type":"string"},"date":{"type":"string","format":"date"},"completed":{"type":"boolean"},"pomodoros":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"description":"Количество завершённых pomodoro сессий"},"intensity":{"type":"integer","enum":[0,1,2,3,4],"example":2,"title":"IntensityLevel"},"completedAt":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"note":{"type":"string","maxLength":500}},"title":"Completion"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
